import React from "react" function ProjectEdit(){ const [show , setShow] = React.useState(false) const [showEdit , setShowEdit] = React.useState(false) const DDButton = (props)=>{ return( <> {console.log("sure?");setShowEdit(true)}} style={{ textAlign : "center" , backgroundColor : "white"}}>Edit {console.log("sure?");setShow(true)}} style={{color :"red" , backgroundColor : "lightPink" , textAlign : "center"}}>Delete {/* Another action Something else */} {/* {setShow(false)}} /> */} {setShow(false)}} > Are you sure about this?

Deletion of the project will delete all the related data, including the spreadsheets.

) } } export default ProjectEdit
